title: Strange behavior when using 'copy package'
description: When using the 'copy package' feature in Eclipse, I encountered an unexpected behavior. Here are the steps to reproduce the issue:
OB: After copying the package, the destination package 'xx' contains another package named 'ui'.
SR:
1. Open Eclipse
2. Go to the 'Package Explorer' view
3. Select a package 'xxx' that you want to copy
4. Right-click on the selected package and choose 'Copy Package'
5. Choose the 'xx' package as the destination
6. Confirm the copy operation

Expected Behavior: The destination package 'xx' should only contain the copied package 'xxx' and not any additional packages.
